io.artframework

Interface TriggerListener<TTarget>

  • Type Parameters:
    TTarget - target type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombinedArtContext, DefaultArtContext
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TriggerListener<TTarget>
    Used to listen on events fired by Triggers.

    Make sure to register your listener either with the ArtContext.onTrigger(Class, TriggerListener).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTrigger(Target<TTarget>[] targets, ExecutionContext<TriggerContext> context)
      Gets called when a trigger got executed and informs its listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • onTrigger

        void onTrigger(Target<TTarget>[] targets,
               ExecutionContext<TriggerContext> context)
        Gets called when a trigger got executed and informs its listeners. You can use the Target.uniqueId() to get a unique non changing identifier of the trigger target that can be used to cache or reference the target.
        Parameters:
        targets - the targets that triggered the trigger
        context - the context of the trigger execution
